title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Parks are a great place to learn, whether it's History or Biology, or anything in between. Take your class to a park for an on-site lesson, or bring the park to your classroom through place- and standards-based activities.  All Curriculum Materials     Traveling Trunks Traveling trunks are a wonderful way to bring the national park experience to your classroom. Trunks contain lesson plans, maps, games, and numerous other activitites. All Traveling Trunks
